captions.text:
-You heard the news? 
-About Mattia? 
-Mattia was picked for the Erasmus!

-Ah! So is he leaving? 
-Yes they picked him! 
-So cool! where is he going? 
-Netherlands!

-Ah 
-He's leaving in September. 
-So where he wanted to go!
-That's the bomb! I'm happy for him! shit, he's going to fuck like there's no tomorrow.

-He'll fuck so much man! Erasmus stories in the Netherlands...woah! Won't be as crazy as in Spain. 
-Of course!
-Erasmus stories in Spain, you basically fuck all the time... it's true!
-I know people that once they got back from the erasmus, took a medical test because they fucked with so many different people!
-I heard about 5 years relationships just flushed in the toilet because of the erasmus!
-Some people change deeply...
-the Erasmus mess you up!
-If I'm not wrong... -Sara! -She applied for it, right? -Yes.
-How did it go? was she picked?
-Yes, she was. -But where?
-Madrid.
-AH! Spain then...Madrid. -And for how long?
-9 months. -Ah, 9 months.
-Well, a regular erasmus lenght... -Chilled, right?
-Anyway, you look quite relaxed. Doesn't look like you took it in the wrong way.
-mhh, in the end I dealt with it better than I thought!
-Yes! Afterall I'm happy for her.
-Rolling! -So how you think Luca dealt with this news?
Look I 'm afraid he's a bit worried. I hope he'll recover.
-I worry when he seems a bit down-hearted.
-You think? -Yes, it is a bit weird sometimes.
-I can tell sometimes he looks more relaxed...what's for sure is that we've seen him in worst conditions...-sorry.
-I think he can deal with it. -Ok, stop!
-How was it?! -Good...good.
-Are you sure the mic wasn't in the frame? -Well from here I didn't notice it; if anything we shall remove it during the post production...

title: The Pills - L'Amore ai Tempi dell'Erasmus [ENG SUBS]

l'umorismo come gli "i-pantellas"
